./external/basejump_stl/bsg_misc/bsg_decode_with_v.v Cov: 100% 

   1: module bsg_decode_with_v #(num_out_p=-1)
   2:    (
   3: 
   4:     input [`BSG_SAFE_CLOG2(num_out_p)-1:0] i
   5:     ,input v_i
   6:     ,output [num_out_p-1:0] o
   7:     );
   8: 
   9:    wire [num_out_p-1:0]                    lo;
  10: 
  11:    bsg_decode #(.num_out_p(num_out_p)
  12:                 ) bd
  13:      (.i
  14:       ,.o(lo)
  15:       );
  16: 
  17:    assign o = { (num_out_p) { v_i } } & lo;
  18: 
  19: endmodule
  20:
